Package simu.model

Class SimulationStatistics

java.lang.Object
simu.model.SimulationStatistics
public class SimulationStatistics extends Object
Data class for storing simulation statistics. Contains metrics such as customers served, throughput, average wait time, peak queue length, and current simulation time.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected double
    avgWaitTime
    Average wait time in seconds
    protected double
    currentTime
    Current simulation time in seconds
    protected int
    peakQueueLength
    Peak queue length observed during simulation
    protected int
    throughput
    Throughput metric (customers per hour)

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationStatistics

      public SimulationStatistics(int customersServed, double throughput, double avgWaitTime, int peakQueueLength, double currentTime)
      Constructs a new SimulationStatistics object with the specified values.
      Parameters:
      customersServed - Total number of customers served
      throughput - Throughput in customers per hour
      avgWaitTime - Average wait time in seconds
      peakQueueLength - Peak queue length observed
      currentTime - Current simulation time in seconds

  • Method Details

    • customerServed

      public void customerServed(double exitTime, double arrivalTime)
      Records a customer being served and updates statistics.
      Parameters:
      exitTime - Time when customer exited the system
      arrivalTime - Time when customer arrived

    • getCustomersServed

      public int getCustomersServed()
      Gets the total number of customers served.
      Returns:
      Number of customers served

    • getAverageWait

      public double getAverageWait()
      Calculates and returns the average wait time.
      Returns:
      Average wait time in seconds, or 0 if no customers served
